tool_description: Mboum Finance Official API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, SEC Data, historical, earnings, technical indicators, live quotes, news, screeners, and more!
name: Mboum Finance
title: Mboum Finance

api_list.name: v1/market/news
api_list.description: Recently published stock news in all sectors.

api_list.name: v1/stock/modules
api_list.description: Get combine stock data such as profile, financial data, statistics, balance sheet, sec-filing, quote, earnings, trends and more!

api_list.name: v1/insider-trades
api_list.description: Latest insider trading activities from CEO, Directors, Chief Executive Officer, 10% Owner, etc...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com/v1/markets/insider-trades"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com/v1/markets/insider-trades"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v1/market/quotes (snapshots)
api_list.description: Quote data for stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, etc...

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Multiple symbols separated by commas. Max is 200
**Equity:** A,APPL,GM,MU,TSLA
**Futures:** ALI=F,CD=F,QM=F,^IXIC,BTC-F
**Forex:** EURUSD=X,AUDUSD=X
**Indexs:** ^DJT,^HSI,^VIX,^TRFK-TC
**Mutual Funds & ETFs:** SPY,AWSHX,VOO,XAIX.BE
**Cryptocurrencies:** BTC-USD,ETH-USD
**Combination:** APPL,CD=F,^VIX,ADA-USD

api_list.name: v2/market/tickers
api_list.description: Get ticker symbols for stocks traded in the U.S exchange.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`. Example: `STOCKS`

api_list.name: v2/market/news
api_list.description: Get market news and press releases for a given company.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Enter one of the following types: `ALL` or `VIDEO` or `PRESS_RELEASE`

api_list.name: v1/stock/history
api_list.description: Historic data for stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, etc...

api_list.name: v1/market/screener
api_list.description: Get a collection of stocks, ETFs, and mutual funds based on selected criteria.

required_parameters.name: list
required_parameters.description:
Select one of these options:

- `trending` Trending tickers in today's market
-  `undervalued_growth_stocks` Stocks with earnings growth
- `growth_technology_stocks ` Technology stocks with revenue
- `day_gainers` Stocks with the highest gains
- `day_losers` Stocks with the highest losses
- `most_actives` Stocks by intraday trade volume.
- `undervalued_large_caps` Undervalued large cap stocks
- `aggressive_small_caps` Small-cap stocks with earnings growth.
- `small_cap_gainers` Small caps with a 1 day price change of 5.0%

api_list.name: v1/market/quotes (real-time)
api_list.description: Real-time Quote data for stocks, ETFs, mutuals funds, etc...

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`. Example: `STOCKS`

api_list.name: v1/options
api_list.description: Get option data for stocks, ETFs, and indexes.

api_list.name: v1/search
api_list.description: Get tickers for any stock company, ETF, mutual fund, crypto and more

api_list.name: v1/indicators/macd
api_list.description: This technical indicator returns the moving average convergence/divergence (MACD)

required_parameters.name: series_type
required_parameters.description: Select from : open | close | high | low

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: A stock (ex: AAPL) or cryptocurrency (ex: BTC-USD) symbol

optional_parameters.name: signal_period
optional_parameters.description: Enter the signal period. Positive integers are accepted. Default: 9

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned, default is 50

optional_parameters.name: slow_period
optional_parameters.description: Enter the slow period. Positive integers are accepted. Default: 26

optional_parameters.name: fast_period
optional_parameters.description: Enter the fast period. Positive integers are accepted. Default: 12

api_list.name: v1/indicators/adx
api_list.description: This technical indicator returns the average directional movement index (ADX).

required_parameters.name: time_period
required_parameters.description: Number of data points used to calculate each moving average value. Positive integers are accepted.

required_parameters.name: series_type
required_parameters.description: Select from : open | close | high | low

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: A stock (ex: AAPL) or cryptocurrency (ex: BTC-USD) symbol

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned, default is 50

api_list.name: v1/indicators/rsi
api_list.description: This technical indicator returns the relative strength index (RSI)

required_parameters.name: time_period
required_parameters.description: Number of data points used to calculate each moving average value. Positive integers are accepted.

required_parameters.name: series_type
required_parameters.description: Select from : open | close | high | low

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: A stock (ex: AAPL) or cryptocurrency (ex: BTC-USD) symbol

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned, default is 50

api_list.name: v1/indicators/sma
api_list.description: This technical indicator returns the simple moving average (SMA).

required_parameters.name: series_type
required_parameters.description: Select from : open | close | high | low

required_parameters.name: time_period
required_parameters.description: Number of data points used to calculate each moving average value. Positive integers are accepted.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: A stock (ex: AAPL) or cryptocurrency (ex: BTC-USD) symbol

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned, default is 50

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com/tr/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mboum-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: stock/history/{stock}/{interval}
api_list.description: Historic data for stocks, ETFs, mutuals funds, etc...

api_list.name: market/undervalued_growth_stocks
api_list.description: Stocks with earnings growth rates better than 25% and relatively low PE and PEG ratios.

api_list.name: market/small_cap_gainers
api_list.description: Small Caps with a 1-day price change of 5.0% or more.

api_list.name: market/aggressive_small_caps
api_list.description: Small cap stocks with earnings growth rates better than 25%.

api_list.name: market/undervalued_large_caps
api_list.description: Large cap stocks that are potentially undervalued.

api_list.name: market/growth_technology_stocks
api_list.description: Technology stocks with revenue and earnings growth in excess of 25%.

api_list.name: calendar/public_offerings
api_list.description: Get the past, current, and upcoming secondary public offerings (SPO) data.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a calendar date, for example: 2023-11 (YYYY-MM)

api_list.name: calendar/ipo
api_list.description: Get the latest and upcoming IPO data. These companies are going public.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a calendar date, for example: 2023-11 (YYYY-MM)

api_list.name: calendar/economic_events
api_list.description: Get global economic events data.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a calendar date, for example: 2023-11-30

optional_parameters.description: Enter a calendar date, for example: 2023-11-30
